titles.title: Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act
To designate a portion of the White Salmon River as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Resources.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health.
Subcommittee on Forests and Forest Health Discharged.
Committee Consideration and Mark-up Session Held.

calendar.text: Ordered to be Reported by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Reported by the Committee on Resources. H. Rept. 109-125.

calendar.text: Placed on the Union Calendar, Calendar No. 71.

action.text: Mr. Pearce moved to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended.
Considered under suspension of the rules.
DEBATE - The House proceeded with forty minutes of debate on H.R. 38.

vote.text: On motion to suspend the rules and pass the bill, as amended Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Motion to reconsider laid on the table Agreed to without objection.
Received in the Senate and Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.
Senate Committee on Energy and Natural Resources discharged by Unanimous Consent.

vote.text: Passed Senate without amendment by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 8/2/2005--Public Law. Upper White Salmon Wild and Scenic Rivers Act - Amends the Wild and Scenic Rivers Act to designate specified portions of the White Salmon River, Washington, as a component of the National Wild and Scenic Rivers System. Authorizes appropriations.
